title: I hate playing against Riven
body:
I don't care about the hate this'll get I just wanted to say if there's a champ in this game I would remove it wouldn't be yasuo, zoe or nasus, it'd be Riven.

Every Riven matchup is decided by the Riven player making a mistake or not, this champ completely removes any and all counterplay if the person playing her has a brain. She's supposed to be high skillcap yet she maintains a high winrate and a ridiculously high playrate.
What irks me the most is Riven players will never admit how disgustingly unbalanced this champ is, they just flash on you the second they hit lvl 6 and kill you while CC locking you with her stun and knockup. Even Zed doesn't oneshot as easily as lvl 6.

"Dude its {{item:3812}} ,{{item:3071}} ,{{item:3161}} , Brutalizer, Conqueror, etc" 
The cognitive dissonance is fucking insane, they will NEVER admit that this champ has been broken for years now, that this champ's design is flawed.

The only counter to Riven is a ban, riven players usually feed on fair champs.

54.6% winrate diamond and above(highest for intended top laners)
13.7% pickrate (highest top lane)
